<div class="header">
    <h1>Datasets</h1>
    <p>Explore our curated collection of datasets, designed to support diverse academic and research endeavors in public health. Our datasets are categorized by access type:</p>
<ul>
  <li><strong>Freely Accessible</strong>: Open to everyone without any restrictions.</li>
  <li><strong>Restricted Access</strong>: Available with certain conditions, such as applying for approval or signing a Data Use Agreement (DUA).</li>
  <li><strong>Licensed Access</strong>: Requires a license to access. Some licensed datasets are freely accessible to Yale affiliates and are categorized under this requirement.</li>
</ul>
</div>
